data.title: Andy Roberts Music
data.meta_description:
This is intended to be an informal, relaxed music performance evening amongst friends, neighbours and visitors. 
Neither a rowdy pub night nor a sitting in rows concert, but something in between. Hence 'Live Lounge" 
Enjoy two hours (with interval) of interesting live music while enjoying company and drinks from the reasonably priced bottle bar. 
Andy Roberts is a seasoned Island based singer songwriter with a large repertoire of interesting catchy originals and some covers mainly from the 1970s including inspirations Roy Harper, Michael Chapman, Pink Floyd, Richard Thompson, The Faces and many more.  Accomplished guitar work carries through all the songs including interpretations of band songs, and the voice in his mid sixties has lost none of it's power and tone.
data.text: This site only uses a few cookies. Some strictly necessary (required for the operation of the site such as the shopping cart) and some for Google/Facebook/Bing Analytics. To learn more about cookies, please read our cookie policy I Accept Reject
